text: "Brown Eyed Girl" is a 1967 debut single by Northern Irish singer Van Morrison. It was taken from his debut studio album Blowin' Your Mind!. It went to number 10 in the United States and number 60 in the United Kingdom in 2013. It became a signature song by Morrison. It has been covered by many artists including Jimmy Buffett in 1983. ==References== Category:1967 songs Category:Debut singles Category:Soft rock songs Category:Pop rock songs Category:Van Morrison songs Category:Jimmy Buffett songs Category:Everclear (band) songs Category:Bruce Springsteen songs Category:Adele songs Category:U2 songs Category:John Anderson (singer) songs Category:Ronan Keating songs Category:The Black Sorrows songs
title: Brown Eyed Girl
